channel.title: Lottery command

item.title: Lottery command
item.dc:creator: @Get_Forgotten Get_Forgotten
item.description:
@Get_Forgotten wrote:

Uh something like this maybe…

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“lottery”) && playerHasItemAmount(995, 100000000)) {

if (winner()) {

	addItem(995, 500000000);
		sendMessage("You've won the lottery congradulations!!");

} else if (!winner()) {

	deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 100000000);
		sendMessage("You've lost all of your money. Better luck next time.");

}

}[/code]

item.title: Lottery command
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

DUDE!!! just do this!!! LMFAO!!!

public void lottery() { if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 40000000)) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 40000000); if(misc.random(9) == 1) { addItem(995, 100000000); sendMessage("You won the lottery!"); sendMessage("You lucky bitch!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "" +playerName+ " is a lucky bitch who just won the lottery!"; actionTimer = 7; } else if(misc.random(50) == 5) { addItem(995, 10000000); addItem(1048, 1); sendMessage("You won the JACKPOT!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "" +playerName+ " just won the lottery JACKPOT!!!"; actionTimer = 12; } else sendMessage("You lose your money...."); } }

and then add

case 2360: if (actionTimer == 0) { lottery(); actionTimer = 7; } break;
then spawn the chest…

	makeGlobalObject(X-co, Y-co, 2360, 0, 10); // Lottery Chest

… remember to paste them in the RIGHT areas!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Lottery command
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("lottery")) { if(winner()) { sendMessage("Congratulations! You won 500mil!"); addItem(995, 500000000); } else { if(playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) { // Do stuff. } else { sendMessage("You need to have 100 million gold coins to use the lottery!"); } } }

Whoops, I missed the bracket after the playerHasItem check.

item.title: Lottery command
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Cause if(winner()) is outside the command.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("lottery")) { if(winner()) { sendMessage("Congratulations! You won 500mil!"); addItem(995, 500000000); } else { if(playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) { // Do stuff. } else { sendMessage("You need to have 100 million gold coins to use the lottery!"); } }

Try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Lottery command

item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

i got some errors, here was my command
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“lottery”)) {
if(playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) {
// Do stuff.
} else {
sendMessage(“You need to have 100 million gold coins to use the lottery!”);
}
}
if(winner()) {
sendMessage(“Congratulations! You won 500mil!”);
addItem(995, 500000000);
}

item.title: Lottery command
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

This is one from rsc. It randomizes the possible choices all stringing from the NPC Chat messages.

Instead of making a command… why not make an NPC like this one?

public void handleNpc(final Npc npc,final Player player) throws Exception { player.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "Good day there, care to gamble?", player)); player.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "The more you bet the better the prize, no lie!", player)); player.setBusy(true); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(player) { public void action() { owner.setBusy(false); String[] options = new String[]{"I'll Gamble 100k.", "I'll Gamble 500k.", "I'll Gamble 1000k", "No thanks, I'm broke."}; owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(options) { public void handleReply(final int option, final String reply) { if(owner.isBusy()) { return; } owner.informOfChatMessage(new ChatMessage(owner, reply, npc)); owner.setBusy(true); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { owner.setBusy(false); if(option == 0 ) { if(player.getInventory().countId(10) > 99999) { owner.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "Thank you Sir, Good luck to you!", owner)); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { owner.setBusy(false); Random generator = new Random(); Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in); int number = generator.nextInt(22) + 1; if(number == 0) { player.getInventory().remove(10, 100000); player.getInventory().add(new InvItem(400, 1));//Rune Chain player.getActionSender().sendInventory(); player.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gre@You won a @whi@Rune Chain"); }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 09, 2009, 07:37:06 pm[/size][hr]Of course you would need to add on more options to that But still. Its a basic lottery type of thing

Read full topic

if(playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) {
addItem(995, 500000000)) {
sendMessage(“You have played and won the lotery!”);
else
sendMessage(“You need to have 100 million gold coins to use the lottery!”);
}
}
}
